Package com.wingman.defaultplugins.devutils.util

Class Painting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wingman.defaultplugins.devutils.util.Painting

  • public class Painting
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides API for simplifying the process of drawing on the game's Graphics objects.

    • Method Detail

      • drawTileOverlay

        public static boolean drawTileOverlay​(java.awt.Graphics graphics,
                                      int x,
                                      int y,
                                      int zOffset,
                                      int plane,
                                      java.awt.Color outlineColor,
                                      java.awt.Color fillColor,
                                      float lineThickness)
        Draws a transparent polygon over a tile.
        Parameters:
        graphics - Graphics object on which the overlay should be drawn
        x - center x coordinate of the tile
        y - center y coordinate of the tile
        plane - plane on which the tile exists
        zOffset - offset on the z axis of the drawn polygon
        outlineColor - color of the outline of the polygon
        fillColor - color of the inside of the polygon
        lineThickness - thickness of the line around the polygon
        Returns:
        true if the overlay was drawn; false otherwise

      • drawTileOverlayBox

        public static boolean drawTileOverlayBox​(java.awt.Graphics graphics,
                                         int x,
                                         int y,
                                         int zOffset,
                                         int plane,
                                         int height,
                                         java.awt.Color outlineColor,
                                         java.awt.Color fillColor,
                                         float lineThickness)
        Draws a transparent polygon box over a tile.
        Parameters:
        graphics - graphics object on which the overlay should be drawn
        x - center x coordinate of the tile
        y - center y coordinate of the tile
        height - the height of the box
        plane - plane on which the tile exists
        zOffset - offset on the z axis of the drawn polygon
        outlineColor - color of the outline of the polygon
        fillColor - color of the inside of the polygon
        lineThickness - thickness of the line around the polygon
        Returns:
        true if the overlay was drawn; false otherwise
